name: Salvage (itch) (Paladin-Cleric of Awesome)
description:
You work for the USR (United Salvage Retrieval) Company, sent out to the far reaches of space to salvage the space wrecks and derelict space stations left from the Galactic War. 

You and your team leave your ship to start your next Salvage job, unaware of the treasures, and dangers you might come across. 

What you need to Play

Pen, Paper and a 6-sided dice

A second game idea for a Game Jam. Please enjoy and let me know what you think.

thank you!
